email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and LOA of 280m. The laycan is October 15-20. Our starting freight quote is $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than expected. Could you consider something in the low 50s, say $50.75? Also, can you confirm the laytime and demurrage terms? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I can offer $51.00 per metric ton, which is competitive given the current market. Laytime is 72 hours total, and demurrage is $25,000 per day pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Cheers, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $51.00 sounds reasonable. However, could we push the laycan to October 16-21 to align with our loading schedule? Also, can we cap the demurrage at $20,000 per day? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I’ve confirmed with the owner, and we can adjust the laycan to October 16-21. However, the demurrage rate is fixed at $25,000 per day due to the vessel’s tight schedule. Let me know if we can proceed. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, understood on the demurrage. Let’s proceed with the laycan of October 16-21 and the freight rate of $51.00 per metric ton. Please send over the recap for review. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Recap: Crude Oil Shipment - MV Ocean Star
email_chain.body: Hi John, as discussed, here’s the recap: Vessel: MV Ocean Star, DWT: 150,000, LOA: 280m. Cargo: Crude Oil, 140,000 MT. Load Port: Houston, Discharge Port: Rotterdam. Laycan: October 16-21. Freight: $51.00 per metric ton. Demurrage: $25,000 per day pro rata. Please confirm. Best, Sarah
